resources.string: Enter Login Details You are watching "Adventure Seminar" organized by HSTU Adventure Club. In this seminar we will discuss about one of the key factors when to comes to hiking, mounteering and anything that comes with adventure. We have with us our resource person Anupom Chaterjee, who is an experienced mountaineer and hiker, whos here to share his valuable skills and experiences with us. If you have any questions, please ask them on the comment section of facebook live and on the chatbox of google meet where this meeting is running. If youre inside the meeting with us please keep your microphone muted at all times and ask your questions via text, thank you.
